Description: This auction is for a 2002 Gibson SG Special. Crescent moon inlays on the Ebony neck. It is a work horse and the body and the headstock show some honest wear that a lot of folks pay good money for. See photos. There are no cracks, breaks, damage, or ANYTHING detrimental to the performance of this fine ANIMAL. All wear is cosmetic. The upgrades on this flame thrower are incredible. 2 Seymore Duncan SH-8 Invaders.Bigsby Tremolo, with the Vibratmate attachment (not drilled or modified in ANY way) Dont like it?, take it off and put the normal bridge on.Schaller roller bridge (the only animal I know that can keep a Bigsby in tune correctly.)High end wiring harness with oil filled WD caps. Professionally set up and ready to growl. Just a FINE World Class guitar. It has NON GIBSON hard shell case to protect it . Actually it is an Alverez case. It will ship safely and fast via Fed Ex. It will require a signature upon delivery and be insured. CONT. USA ONLY! It will require a PAY PAL payment ONLY within 24 hours of auction end, or I will relist it immediately. As always, I will stand by this guitars authenticity with all that I am. Please heck my stats. GOOD LUCK BIDDING.
Title: 2002 Gibson SG Special faded. Crescent moon ebony neck. MASSIVE upgrades.
Subtitle: A real Flame thrower! Built to kill.
